*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Peach Creek*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="08-16-1826">Aug 16. 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*I understand that your *location_mentioned*office */location_mentioned*is again opin to receive applications for *location_mentioned*land*/location_mentioned*; and having never yet recd any *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*in the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*, I wish to embrace the first opportunity to secure my alloted portion—As you have once made out my deed for half a league I hope you will yet con- sider me entitled to that Quantity; particularly as I have been one of the first *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*in this *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*, and have never been backward in doing a *person_mentioned*soldier*/person_mentioned*'s duty.—The *location_mentioned*good land*/location_mentioned* has been so generally taken up that I hardly know where to make a choice.—Perhaps there may be some *location_mentioned*forfeited land */location_mentioned*that you could recommend; if not, I have thought to take it on a small *location_mentioned*stream */location_mentioned*which heads in the *location_mentioned*Bay prairie*/location_mentioned*, and runs, perhaps, into the bay of *location_mentioned*Matagorde*/location_mentioned*—you will please to give me a verbal reply by *person_mentioned*Mr. Rabb*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John Ingram*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
